name: Admine
tag_list: deals, shopping-online, ecommerce, marketing, advertising, blog, social-network, social-shopping, ad-block, privacy, security
overview:
Admine is a social shopping network where consumers can earn money as they click on posts in their ‘discussions’ feeds, as well as share comments and write advertising reviews. Users create accounts and customize their feeds according to categories and keywords of interest. Companies, organizations, and advertising parties have blog-style home pages and internal support pages for managing campaigns and content. The Admine directory features all home pages listed in the network.

Admine also has an ad-blocking toolbar that users can download for free for no-ads browsing (IE8 or FF v.3 and above).

Admine, and its parent company MyBox LLC, share the philosophy that web advertising should not compromise an individual’s online privacy, and web users should maintain full control of their screen content. The Admine economic model therefore values consumer preferences instead of rewarding web-tracking behaviors. The Admine and MyBox LLC vision is to create new, efficient tools that help brands, organizations, and consumers connect online.
